entry.title: WINTER STORM WARNING , Whitby
entry.summary: Persons in or near this area should be on the lookout for adverse weather conditions and take necessary safety precautions. Issued: 09:49 AM EST Friday 23 December 2022

entry.title: Current Conditions: Light Rain, 2.2°C

entry.title: Friday: Snow or rain. Temperature falling to minus 10 this afternoon.
entry.summary: Rain changing to snow and blowing snow this morning. Snowfall amount 5 cm. Wind becoming southeast 30 km/h then southwest 60 gusting to 90 this afternoon. Temperature falling to minus 10 this afternoon. Wind chill minus 23 this afternoon. Forecast issued 08:26 AM EST Friday 23 December 2022

entry.title: Friday night: Periods of snow and blowing snow. Temperature steady near minus 9.
entry.summary: Periods of light snow and blowing snow. Amount 2 cm. Wind southwest 60 km/h gusting to 90. Temperature steady near minus 9. Wind chill near minus 22. Forecast issued 08:26 AM EST Friday 23 December 2022

entry.title: Saturday: A few flurries. Temperature steady near minus 8.
